ModMetaData.name: MoHAR Framework (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Gouda quiche https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2057001924 https://github.com/goudaQuiche If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
This was already forked - but copying the assemblies from 1.5 into a 1.6 folder and thinking that's enough, simply isn't going to cut it.
Now recompiled against 1.6.
--
Original mod notes (1.5):
Adds hediffs and other components for mod creators.
